author: jbellis
msg: expose threadpool's pendingtasks via nodeprobe.  patch by Sammy Yu; reviewed by jbellis for CASSANDRA-360

author: jbellis
msg: Move CFSerializer into its own file.  Rename deserializeEmpty to deserializeFromSSTableNoColumns; add serializeForSSTable and serializeWithIndexes to do the without-metadata serialization.  Add SSTableReader.makeColumnFamily to create the CF skeleton w/o reading any data.
patch by jbellis; reviewed by Sandeep Tata for CASSANDRA-233

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1437 Removed msgs dumped to stdout from tearDown()
